data.title: Friday’s TV Talk Shows
data.meta_description: This article was originally on a blog post platform and may be missing photos, graphics or links.
data.text:
This article was originally on a blog post platform and may be missing photos, graphics or links. See About archive blog posts.

CBS This Morning Comic Jim Gaffigan; director James Cameron. (N) 7 a.m. KCBS

Today Allison Williams; former LAPD chief William Bratton; real estate; Adam Levine. (N) 7 a.m. KNBC

KTLA Morning News (N) 7 a.m. KTLA

Good Morning America (N) 7 a.m. KABC

Good Day L.A. (N) 7 a.m. KTTV

Rachael Ray Dr. Travis Stork tells how to burn extra calories; simplifying life in the kitchen. (N) 8 a.m. KCAL

Live With Kelly DJ Twist; John Slattery; Martha Plimpton; auto show; co-host Joel McHale. (N) 9 a.m. KABC

The View Jeff Goldblum; Brian Presley and Erin Hershey Presley; Reza Farahan and Golnesa Gharachedaghi (“Shahs of Sunset”). (N) 10 a.m. KABC

The Talk David James Elliott; guest co-host Guy Fieri. (N) 1 p.m. KCBS

Dr. Phil Euthanasia; chronic Lyme disease. (N) 3 p.m. KCBS

The Dr. Oz Show Energy boosters; organizing. (N) 3 p.m. KABC

The Ellen DeGeneres Show Sean Hayes; Gabrielle Union; author Wayne Pacelle; 7-year-old pizza tosser. (N) 4 p.m. KNBC

Anderson The former wife of the D.C. sniper; how to identify if someone is violent. (N) 4 p.m. KTTV

Piers Morgan Tonight (N) 6 and 9 p.m. CNN

Real Time With Bill Maher Former Canadian prime minister Kim Campbell; journalist Matthew Continetti. (N) 10 p.m. HBO

Charlie Rose (N) 11 p.m. KVCR, midnight KOCE

Chelsea Lately Amanda Seyfried. 11 p.m. E!

Late Show With David Letterman Julia Louis-Dreyfus; comic Keith Alberstadt; Bonnie Raitt performs. (N) 11:35 p.m. KCBS

The Tonight Show With Jay Leno Jason Segel; Anna Faris; Far East Movement performs. (N) 11:35 p.m. KNBC

Nightline (N) 11:35 p.m. KABC

Jimmy Kimmel Live Edie Falco; Jack Wagner. midnight KABC

The Late Late Show With Craig Ferguson Sean Hayes; Lena Dunham (“Girls”). (N) 12:37 a.m. KCBS
